sentence.Network_en: Her pride was hurt and she felt revengeful.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的自尊心被伤害了,她想报复.

sentence.Network_en: He felt savage and thirsty and revengeful, annoyed with himself and with everyone else.
sentence.Network_cn: 他激愤,口干舌燥,渴望报仇, 他恨自己,也恨一切人.

sentence.Network_en: Most who disclose revengeful motives marry the punishment that follows.
sentence.Network_cn: 大多数人,报复动机暴露了,得到随之而来的惩罚.

stems_affixes.word_buile: venge惩罚[引申为报仇]+ful充满……的→充满惩罚的心→复仇心重的
